article.title: CSC to Provide IT Support to HHS
article.author: Henry Kenyon
article.text: The U.S. Department of Health and Human Services (HHS) has awarded CSC a contract to support the department's Information Technology Infrastructure Operations effort. Under the contract, CSC is one of two companies eligible to compete for task orders in several categories. The company will compete to provide Web services, including Internet and remote access to the HHS server.
